author: Hypertext
title: SPEEDRUN - Starlink's Africa troubles
text:
Despite being available in several markets across the African continent, satellite internet provider Starlink is struggling with tariffs, regulations and threats of sanctions in some of its biggest markets, including Kenya, Nigeria and South Africa.
The latest sees the SpaceX company struck by an over 100 percent license fee raise in Kenya.
Starlink is getting squeezed in Africa New products are dropping fast at CES 2025 in Las Vegas. After rumours were milling, we finally get to see the SteamOS powered Lenovo Legion Go S, and its smaller than the original Legion Go.
“As the S in the name would suggest, this latest offering is smaller than the Legion Go that Lenovo debuted last year. More specifically it features a smaller 8″ display, with a WUXGA 16:10 120Hz PureSight touch panel present. In terms of controls, the chassis sports fused TrueStrike controllers with adjustable trigger switches and hall-effect joysticks,” writes our Robin-Leigh Chetty.
